Package model.timer

Interface TimerPlayer

All Known Implementing Classes:
TimerPlayerImpl
public interface TimerPlayer
This interface models a Player with its own Timer.

  • Method Details

    • isCurrentPlayer

      boolean isCurrentPlayer()
      Method that compares the user playing is the same for which time is flowing.
      Returns:
      true if the comparison was successful.

    • getTimeLeft

      double getTimeLeft()
      Getter for the timeleft variable.
      Returns:
      the number of seconds left.

    • subtractTime

      A method that decrements the timer.
      Parameters:
      delta - the interval of time elapsed.

    • isTimerExpired

      boolean isTimerExpired()
      This method checks if the time limit has been reached.
      Returns:
      true if the timer is expired.
